column1: HDPulse: An Ecosystem of Minority Health and Health Disparities Resources. National Institute on Minority Health and Health Disparities. Created 12/1/2023. Available from https://hdpulse.nimhd.nih.gov
Source: Demographic data provided by the Census Bureau (http://www.census.gov/) & the American Community Survey (http://www.census.gov/acs/www/).
For more information about Education (Less than 9th grade), see the dictionary at http://hdpulse.nimhd.nih.gov/data/dictionary.php#education.
